question: Will 3 QBs and 2 WRs be taken with the first 5 picks of the 2024 NFL Draft?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if 3 quarterbacks and 2 wide receivers are taken with the top five picks of the 2024 NFL Draft. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, or announcements from specific NFL teams, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

If the 2024 NFL Draft does not take place this market will resolve to “No”.

question: Will 4 QBs and 1 WR be taken with the first 5 picks of the 2024 NFL Draft?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if 4 quarterbacks and 1 wide receivers are taken with the top five picks of the 2024 NFL Draft. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

If the 2024 NFL Draft does not take place this market will resolve to “No”.

question: Will 3 QBs, 1 WR and 1 OT be taken with the first 5 picks of the 2024 NFL Draft?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if 3 quarterbacks, 1 wide receiver, and 1 offensive tackle are taken with the top five picks of the 2024 NFL Draft. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, or announcements from specific NFL teams, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

If the 2024 NFL Draft does not take place this market will resolve to “No”.

description:

question: Will  the first 5 picks of the 2024 NFL Draft be another combination?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the top 5 picks of the 2024 NFL Draft represent any combination of positions other than those listed. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”. 

Combinations: 3 QBs & 2 WRs; 4 QBs & 1 WR; 3 QBs, 1 WR & 1 OT; 5 QBs; 4 QBs, 1 OT

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, or announcements from specific NFL teams, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

If the 2024 NFL Draft does not take place this market will resolve to “Yes”.

question: 3 or fewer QBs drafted in 1st round?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if 3 or fewer quarterbacks are drafted in the first round of the 2024 NFL Draft. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, or announcements from specific NFL teams, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

events.title: How many QBs drafted in 1st round of NFL Draft?

question: Will Russia control Chasiv Yar on May 9?
description:
Russian forces have begun attacking the strategic city of Chasiv Yar, seeking to capture the eastern Ukrainian city by Russia's national Victory Day on May 9, 2024.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if, according to the ISW map, Russia controls the Chasiv Yar railroad station located on Pryvokazlna Vulytsia on May 9, 2024 at 11:59 PM ET. 

The railroad station will be considered under Russian control if any part of the train station is shaded red on the ISW map (https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375). If the area is not shaded red on May 9, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve to “No”.

Train Station Location: https://polymarket-upload.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/Chasiv+Yar+Train+Station.png

Chasiv Yar Location: https://polymarket-upload.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/Chasiv+Yar+Ukraine+Location.png

The primary resolution source for this market will be the ISW Ukraine map. If the ISW map is rendered permanently unavailable, information from Liveuamap (https://liveuamap.com/) may be used. If information from both the ISW and Liveuamap are rendered permanently unavailable, a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

events.title: Will Russia control Chasiv Yar on May 9?

question: Will X start charging new users before July?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if, by June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, X implements a fee for new U.S. users to create an account or to access any of the following four functionalities: posting, liking, bookmarking, or replying.

Fees include implemented required payments for any of these activities, effective for the majority of non-blue checkmark new U.S. users by the market's deadline.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting that fees have been implemented and are actively in effect.

events.title: Will X start charging new users before July?

question: Will a Democrat win Washington DC Presidential Election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a Democratic candidate wins the popular vote in Washington DC in the 2024 US presidential election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

A candidate shall be considered to represent a party in the event that he or she is the nominee, or has a ballot-listed or otherwise identifiable party preference, of the party in question.

The resolution source for this market is the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. This market will resolve once all three sources call the race for the same candidate. If all three sources haven’t called the race in this state for the same candidate, this market will resolve based on the official certification.

events.title: Washington DC Presidential Election Winner
events.description: This is a market on predicting the winner of the presidential election in Washington DC.

events.title: Washington DC Presidential Election Winner

question: Will a candidate from another party win Washington DC Presidential Election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a candidate from neither the Democratic nor Republican parties wins the popular vote in Washington DC in the 2024 US presidential election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

A candidate shall be considered to represent a party in the event that he or she is the nominee, or has a ballot-listed or otherwise identifiable party preference, of the party in question.

The resolution source for this market is the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC. This market will resolve once all three sources call the race for the same candidate. If all three sources haven’t called the race in this state for the same candidate, this market will resolve based on the official certification.

events.title: Washington DC Presidential Election Winner

question: Katherine Maher out as NPR CEO in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Katherine Maher is no longer employed as CEO of National Public Radio (NPR) for any length of time from the date of this market's inception, April 17, through April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. An announcement of Katherine Maher's resignation/firing/role change before this market's end date will also immediately resolve this market to "Yes", regardless of when the announced resignation/firing goes into effect. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market's primary resolution source will be official information from NPR and/or Katherine Maher, however a consensus of credible reporting sources will also be used.

events.title: Katherine Maher out as NPR CEO in April?

question: Indian election: NDA wins 400+ seats?
description:
The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) is the BJP's electoral coalition. Figures within the BJP, including Narendra Modi, claimed that the BJP-led NDA will win 400 seats or more in the Lok Sabha from the 2024 Indian general election.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the NDA controls 400 or more seats in the Lok Sabha as a result of the 2024 Indian general election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If voting in the 2024 Indian General Election does not occur by December 31, 2024, this market will resolve to "No".

Note: This market will resolve based off the party composition of the NDA at the time of the official announcement of the election results, currently scheduled for June 4. Any subsequent changes to the NDA coalition will not be considered for this market's resolution.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will GCR tweet again in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @GCRClassic and/or @GiganticRebirth posts/tweets again, between April 17, 2024, 12:00 PM ET and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts/tweets count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts/retweets will not count.

The resolution source for this market will be GCR's verified X/Twitter accounts: https://twitter.com/GCRClassic and/or https://twitter.com/GiganticRebirth.

Please note, only the verified @GCRClassic and/or @GiganticRebirth X/Twitter accounts count for this market, regardless of the URL for these profiles. If GCR posts/tweets from another account, it has no bearing on the resolution of this market.

events.title: Will GCR tweet again in April?

question: Bitcoin above $60,000 on April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 30 Apr '24 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) has a final “Close” price of 60,000.01 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Ethereum above $3,000 on April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for ETHUSDT 30 Apr '24 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) has a final “Close” price of 3,000.01 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETHUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETHUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: NBA Play-In: Pelicans vs. Kings
description:
This market refers to the NBA Play-In game between the New Orleans Pelicans and Sacramento Kings scheduled for April 19, 2024, 9:30 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Pelicans" if the New Orleans Pelicans win the game.

This market will resolve to "Kings" if the Sacramento Kings win the game.

If the game is not completed by April 25, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Nuggets vs. Lakers
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for April 20:

If the Denver Nuggets win, the market will resolve to "Nuggets”.

If the Los Angles Lakers win, the market will resolve to “Lakers”.

If the game is not completed by April 26, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: X relaunches Vine before June?
description:
On April 17, Elon Musk posted a poll on X asking whether he should bring back the video streaming platform Vine. You can view that poll here: https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1780666831310877100

This market will resolve to "Yes" if X relaunches Vine by May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

"Relaunching Vine" is defined as launching a platform and/or feature that performs similar functions to Vine, and is branded as a "relaunch of Vine" by Elon Musk or X itself. Note - the relaunch must be live and broadly accessible to the public before the resolution date for this market to resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source will be the Vine platform, as well as official information from Elon Musk and X, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Mike Johnson out as Speaker before June?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Mike Johnson announces that he will resign from his position as Speaker of the US House of Representatives, or otherwise ceases to be Speaker for any length of time, between April 16, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, and May 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Note that an announcement of his resignation before the resolution date will suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" regardless of if/when he actually steps down.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Government of the United States of America or official statements by Mike Johnson or his representative, however a consensus of credible reporting will suffice.

events.title: Mike Johnson out as Speaker before June?
